info.name: GameMaker Forum - Light
info.description: Very simple light skin for the new GameMaker Forums at https://forum.yoyogames.com/index.php
info.additionalInfo: Version 0.2 Updated the style a bit. Added style to some areas that I had not thought of, styled some new additions to the forums, and improved some already styled parts. Version 0.1 Initial version. It's very simple and rudimentary. Not everything is styled, only the "main" parts of the forum.
